output_list.criticism: The transfer function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value by transferring more tokens than the sender has.
The transferFrom function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value by transferring more tokens than the sender has.
The distributeFUD function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value by distributing more tokens than the contract has.
The getEthBalance function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value by transferring more tokens than the sender has.
The balances function does not have proper access control checks. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The allowed function does not have proper access control checks. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The transferOwnership function does not have proper checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary user's balance to any value by transferring more tokens than the sender has.
